titleStmt.title: A political essay, or, Summary review of the kings and government of England since the Norman Conquest by W. P---y, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Pudsey, William.
Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

notesStmt.note: Written by W. Pudsey. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Wrongly attributed to Sir William Petty. Cf. Watt's Bibl. Brit., vol. II, 75li.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
